description:
Armed with a specially selected chamois and body-mapped fabrics for ultimate microclimate control, these breathable bib shorts are designed to keep you comfortable throughout long-distance missions.

Built using three different body-mapped fabrics for ultimate breathability and support, the Cinder Liner Bib Shorts are perfect for layering on all your two-wheeled adventures. They offer airflow where you need it and strategically placed high-wicking mesh to manage moisture, keeping you cool and well ventilated when you’re powering up an incline. The specially selected, Elastic Interface® Gravel Performance men’s-specific chamois provides low-bulk cushioning, for enhanced comfort on long-distance rides.

The details have been designed for your comfort, such as soft-feel woven elastic bib straps and a seamless inner thigh to reduce sore spots, keeping you focused on the trail ahead. Silicone grips on the lower hem keep the shorts in place, and the articulated fit is tailored for miles in the saddle. Mesh stash pockets can be found on the thighs and rear of the bib, giving you plenty of options for storing snacks and other essentials that you need to access on the move. Breathable and protective, the Cinder Liner Bib Shorts provide you with enduring comfort over distance.
name: Rab Cinder Liner Bib Shorts - Mens
